title: A Soccer Team Once United Iran. Now It Reflects Its Divisions.
description: A squad long seen as a unifying force in a fractious nation has become ensnared in its internal politics as it heads to the World Cup.
dc:creator: Jeré Longman and Farnaz Fassihi

media:content.media:description: Iran’s national soccer team, known as Team Melli, before a friendly against Uruguay in September.
